orig_text:
3.4 Registration template

   To: media-feature-tags@apps.ietf.org (Media feature tags mailing list)
correct_text:
3.4 Registration template

   To: media-feature-tags@ietf.org (Media feature tags mailing list)
notes:
This is neither Editorial nor Technical but procedural.

I am the owner of the media-feature-tags@ietf.org mailing list for many years, though I never hosted or created it.  The list is still available for media feature tag registration, but not at the apps.ietf.org domain any more, only at the ietf.org domain.

Note: As of the processing of this errata, mail sent to media-feature-tags@apps.ietf.org will be redirected to the media-features-tags@ietf.org mailing list.
